title: [Large-scale] Educational Technology Integration Strategies for Teacher Training

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with fundamental educational technology tools and understanding of lecture-based teaching methods
context.additional_context: A course exploring effective educational technology strategies beyond hardware-centric integration, referencing the Zimbabwe case study

learning_goals: Learners can effectively deliver core concepts using digital tools (interactive whiteboards, presentation software) in lecture-based instruction.
Learners can propose three or more lesson designs that integrate educational technology tools not merely as supplementary aids but as tools for achieving educational objectives.
Learners can develop and implement two or more examples of technology-enhanced teaching methods linking online and offline activities in blended environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
